v1.0.0.name: Basic Long-term Value
v1.0.0.description: Basic value investing criteria with momentum

fundamental_growth.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest close > latest sma(close,200) and latest rsi(14) > 30 and latest rsi(14) < 70 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) and latest "close * volume" > 10000000 and latest "market cap" > 1000 ) )
fundamental_growth.description: Growth stocks with good fundamentals and momentum

value_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest ema(close,21) and latest ema(close,21) > latest ema(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,10) and latest rsi(14) > 40 and latest rsi(14) < 80 and [0] 1 day ago close < [0] 1 day ago high * 0.98 ) )

quality_filter.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > 100000 and latest "market cap" > 5000 and latest close > [0] 1 week ago close and latest macd line(26,12,9) > latest macd signal(26,12,9) ) )

v1.1.0.name: Enhanced Value with Sector Rotation
v1.1.0.description: Improved algorithm with sector rotation and better volume filters

enhanced_fundamental.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest close > latest sma(close,200) and latest rsi(14) > 35 and latest rsi(14) < 65 and latest volume > latest ema(volume,20) * 1.2 and latest "close * volume" > 20000000 and latest "market cap" > 2000 and [0] 1 week ago close > [0] 1 week ago low * 1.05 ) )
enhanced_fundamental.description: Enhanced fundamental screening with better volume criteria

momentum_breakout.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest highest(close,20) * 0.95 and latest volume > latest ema(volume,20) * 1.5 and latest rsi(14) > 50 and latest macd line(26,12,9) > latest macd signal(26,12,9) and latest ema(close,8) > latest ema(close,21) and latest close > latest bollinger band upper(close,20,2) * 0.98 ) )

sector_leaders.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.1 and latest "market cap" > 10000 and latest close > [0] 1 month ago close and latest rsi(14) > 45 and latest rsi(14) < 75 ) )
sector_leaders.description: Sector leading stocks with consistent performance

dividend_quality.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 50000 and latest "market cap" > 5000 and latest close > [0] 3 month ago close and latest rsi(14) > 40 and latest macd line(26,12,9) > latest macd signal(26,12,9) ) )
